downloadTitle: Poster: What is governance in SharePoint 2013?
downloadDescription: This poster shows the major governance areas (IT governance, information management, and application management) and summarizes the key information you need to understand about each area.
detailsSection: Governance is the set of policies, roles, responsibilities, and processes that control how an organization's business divisions and IT teams work together to meet organizational goals. This poster shows the major governance areas (IT governance, information management, and application management) and summarizes the key information you need to understand about each area.
systemRequirementsSection:
• The file is a Microsoft Viso document. Users who do not have Microsoft Visio can view this document through the downloadable Visio Viewer.
  • The file is an Adobe Reader file. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.

installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
